name: Mystic Box (Anime)
text:
Activate only when you control a Spellcaster-Type monster or there is a Spellcaster-Type monster you originally controlled that is now face-up on your opponent's field or Spell/Trap Zone. Activate 1 of these effects:
? Target 1 Spellcaster-Type monster you control; equip this card to that target. Immediately after this effect resolves, target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it and this card.
? Target 1 Spellcaster-Type monster you originally controlled that is now face-up on your opponent's field or Spell/Trap Zone and 1 monster your opponent controls; Special Summon the first target on your side of the field, then move the second target to the first target's previous Monster Zone or Spell/Trap Zone. (If the first target was equipped to a monster, the second target is now equipped to the monster that the first target was equipped to and apply the effects as if it were equipped by that monster's effect.)
